product_name: Roxy Sunset Art Snow Goggles - Women's
long_description: Express yourself when you're on the snow with the stylish Roxy Sunset Art women's snow goggles, which feature fresh graphics and an amber-tinted lens that works well when it's snowing or overcast. Graphics add style on strap and frame. Orange-tinted lens performs best in cloudy or snowy conditions; lens boasts an antifog treatment and vents to combat lens fogging. Double-layer lens helps reduce fogging by creating a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and warm, moist air around your face. Cylindrical lens helps minimize distortion to ensure a clear, wide field of vision; antiscratch treatment helps protect lens. Durable frame is made of a flexibile polyurethane to provide a comfortable fit. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Helmet compatible design; adjustable strap provides a custom fit. Roxy Sunset Art women's snow goggles come with a microfiber bag that can be used to clean the lens; bag also helps protect the goggles when storing or traveling.
short_description: Express yourself when you're on the snow with the stylish Roxy Sunset Art women's snow goggles, which feature fresh graphics and an amber-tinted lens that works well when it's snowing or overcast.
